requirement: This code is intended to implement a mapping system that translates physical index values within specified sections into corresponding logical register addresses.
provide_code:
FUNCTION_BLOCK mdbsPhyToLogic	//modbus本地索引对应回传华中的状态地址
VAR_INPUT
	section		:INT;	//区域限定(1:grdExt, 2:grdRet, 3:skyExt, 4:skyRet)
	phyIdx		:INT;	//内存物理地址对应数组索引
END_VAR
VAR_OUTPUT
	lgcIdx		:INT;	//华中对应的地址	127 175 223 271...
END_VAR
